chunks.zh: [vip 大放送，人人有份]某抖、某快、某书等数十个平台图文视频无水印下载小程序
chunks.en: [VIP Giveaway, everyone gets a share] Watermark-free download小程序 for text, images, and videos from dozens of platforms like Douyin, Kuaishou, and Xiaohongshu

chunks.zh: 之前做的一个小玩意儿，日活不高，索性送点会员给大家玩玩
chunks.en: I made a little gadget before. The daily active users weren't high, so I decided to give away some memberships for everyone to play with.

chunks.zh: 使用方式在首页教程浮窗里面，每个平台的使用方式大同小异，都是点击分享视频，复制链接然后粘贴等待解析
chunks.en: The usage instructions are in the tutorial floating window on the homepage. The usage methods for each platform are similar. You click on the share video button, copy the link, and paste it to wait for parsing.

chunks.zh:
评论区放一下你在小程序中的用户 id ，每人送一个月会员
![]( https://i.imgur.com/psnzl0F.png)

小程序码奉上：

![]( https://i.imgur.com/kCbHMvA.jpeg)

看情况评论区再抽 5 个永久吧


最后弱弱问一句，v2 的 markdown 支持是不是不完整，没法通过代码对图片做些控制，起码预览时看上去不太正常
chunks.en:
Post your user ID in the小程序in the comments, and everyone will get a one-month membership.
![]( https://i.imgur.com/psnzl0F.png)

Here's the小程序code:

![]( https://i.imgur.com/kCbHMvA.jpeg)

Depending on the situation, I'll draw 5 permanent ones from the comments.


Finally, a weak question: is v2's markdown support incomplete? I can't control the images with code, and at least the preview doesn't look normal.

chunks.zh: 没有主动宣传嘛？我看去水印搜索量每天都在 1w 左右
chunks.en: Didn't actively promote it? I see the search volume for watermark removal is around 10,000 every day.

chunks.zh: 这些不涉及到版权问题么，这种小程序还能上架？
chunks.en: Doesn't this involve copyright issues? Can this kind of小程序be listed?

chunks.zh: @sniperboy0829 这种其实蛮多的，算擦边球吧，要说风险也确实有可能存在
chunks.en: @sniperboy0829 There are actually quite a few of these. It's a borderline case. If you're talking about risk, it's certainly possible.

chunks.zh: @sagasu0000719 最初版体验比较差，用户流失掉了，后面就没怎么管了
chunks.en: @sagasu0000719 The initial version had a poor experience, and users were lost. I didn't manage it much after that.

chunks.zh: 7f47ded9 谢谢老板,老板大气,老板身体健康(小建议,个人 id 不能点击复制)
chunks.en: 7f47ded9 Thank you, boss, you're generous, and I wish you good health. (Small suggestion: personal ID cannot be clicked to copy)
